metadata.title: CVE-2013-4136 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
ext/common/ServerInstanceDir.h in Phusion Passenger gem before 4.0.6 forRuby allows local users to gain privileges or possibly change the ownershipof arbitrary directories via a symlink attack on a directory with apredictable name in /tmp/.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4136` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-passenger - 4.0.37-2
ruby-passenger - 4.0.37-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-passenger package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.37-2').
